stimulusHtml: Which of the following would be the best location to obtain a water sample from to determine if the paper plant is affecting the acidity of the river?

features.html: A paper company located on the banks of a river discharges its treated wastewater into the river.

choicesHtml: Immediately downstream from the paper plant
Immediately upstream from the paper plant
At an upstream tributary to the river
At a downstream tributary to the river
